text: ficiency - Left ventricular hypertrophy - Low-set ears - Microcephaly - Motor delay - Myopathy - Ocular albinism - Penile hypospadias - Recurrent bacterial infections - Recurrent fungal infections - Recurrent viral infections - Schizencephaly - White matter neuronal heterotopia - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign
